description:
Get Job Simulator PC game for free instantly and play pre-installed on SteamRiP
A tongue-in-cheek virtual reality experience for HTC Vive and Oculus Rift + Touch. In a world where robots have replaced all human jobs, step into the “Job Simulator” to learn what it was like ‘to job’. The events of the game take place in the distant future, in which people stopped working a long time ago and now all they do is use robots in everyday life and in production and just enjoy life. Well, you will also be invited in this unusual automated future to try yourself in the role of a person that he decided to test himself in work, in what his ancestors did. Poly Bridge
In general, the idea is strange, but interesting There are several professions to choose from, and each is unique in its own way, check them all For example, you can become a cashier in the most ordinary store. At least, this is how this profession is presented by play. Although, in fact, the store here is not so ordinary.
Here you will not only have to stand behind the cash register and punch through the goods that customers want to receive, but also serve these goods yourself, and sometimes also cook it, as in the case of hot dogs, and not only. Naturally, for all your actions, you will receive rating points. But this is not the main point here. The main advantage of this game is that it allows you to feel the work to the fullest. All actions take place in virtual reality. Here you can interact with all objects from the environment, communicate with visitors and customers, drink coffee during breaks or offer your products to visitors, have a snack or just create chaos.
